CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to execute script from 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/security/contentTypeOptions/resources/script-with-header.pl?mime=text/csv&options=invalid' because its MIME type ('text/csv') is not executable.
CONSOLE MESSAGE: line 1: Executed script with MIME type: 'text/html'.
CONSOLE MESSAGE: line 1: Executed script with MIME type: 'text/plain'.
This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS text/csv scripts should be blocked. 
PASS text/[not-csv] scripts should not be blocked. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
